# Vertical Align

## Usage

For detailed instructions, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                     | Support     |
|---------------------------|-------------|
| `align-baseline`          | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `align-top`               | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `align-middle`            | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `align-bottom`            | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `align-text-top`          | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `align-text-bottom`       | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `align-sub`               | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `align-super`             | ğŸŒ Web only |
